title: The Security Deposit shall be forfeited either in whole or in part at the discretion of the CIDCO, for breach of any of the provisions of these regulations and conditions attached to the permission covered under the Commencement Certificate
clause_text: The Security Deposit shall be forfeited either in whole or in part at the discretion of the CIDCO, for breach of any of the provisions of these regulations and conditions attached to the permission covered under the Commencement Certificate.
section: (2) 10.14.3 Development of land Notified for Acquisition
